required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comfort Associated With The Use Of Eyelid Cleansing Products Available For The Management Of Demodex Folliculorum
clinical_study.official_title: Comfort Associated With The Use Of Eyelid Cleansing Products Available For The Management Of Demodex Folliculorum

brief_summary.textblock: This aim of this study to quantify the subjective ocular awareness of different eyelid cleansing wipes available for the management of Demodex folliculorum.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Each participant receives 6 different interventions in random order

primary_outcome.measure: Participant's Subjective discomfort - Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Rate the intensity of participant's ocular discomfort (0 is no discomfort, 10 is maximal discomfort)

primary_outcome.measure: Time to comfortably open the eyes after the application of eyelid cleansing wipe
primary_outcome.description: Time to comfortably open the eyes after the application of eyelid cleansing wipe in seconds

arm_group.description: Participant cleans eyelids with Oust™ Demodex® Wipes™

arm_group.arm_group_label: I-LID N LASH PLUS® Eyelid Cleanser
arm_group.description: Participant cleans eyelids with I-LID N LASH PLUS® Eyelid Cleanser
Participant cleans eyelids with Blephadex Lid Wipes
Participant cleans eyelids with Eye Cleanse Lid Wipes
Participant cleans eyelids with Sensitive Eyes® Plus Saline Solution
